insights.text: Funding rate mean-reverts within 8-24 hours — carry strategies exploit this but must manage timing risk.
Volume momentum tilt (vol_mom_z_168 @ r=0.65) is the ONLY validated overlay signal after 117 phases of research.
Binance OI/LS API only provides ~21 days of hourly history — cannot be backtested properly.
Crypto markets trade 24/7 — no session effects, but funding settlement times (every 8h) create micro-patterns.
Cross-asset regime indicators (S&P500, Gold, DXY) add NO value for crypto perpetual futures strategies.

lessons: Taker buy ratio, vol HHI, and funding dispersion — all fail walk-forward validation
On-chain composite signals: IS breakthrough but WF overfit (classic trap)
Fear & Greed momentum: IS promising but WF fails (1/4 positive)
Variance Risk Premium (VRP) is a universal options edge: IV consistently overstates RV by 5-15 vol points in crypto. Most robust options signal.
Deribit is the primary crypto options venue: BTC/ETH options only for liquid strikes. No API key for public endpoints.
Crypto options backtest limitation: historical IV data not available via API. Use realized vol + calibrated VRP model for research. Collect live data for future.
